name: Jalester Silvermane
description: A handsome man who seems to be just another patron nursing a drink. In truth, Jalester is a secret agent of Laeral Silverhand, the Open Lord of Waterdeep. He is a watchful guardian of the city, keeping an eye on the Yawning Portal's clientele for threats to the city.
ideals: Vigilance: 'The price of peace is eternal watchfulness.'
Duty: 'The safety of Waterdeep is my highest calling.'
Subtlety: 'The best work is done when no one knows you've done anything at all.'
bonds: His loyalty to Laeral Silverhand is absolute.
The city of Waterdeep and its people.
The other secret agents of the Lords' Alliance.
flaws: Can be overly secretive, even with potential allies.
His constant vigilance can make him seem paranoid.
Carries the weight of his responsibilities heavily.
motivations: To identify and recruit potential assets for the Lords' Alliance.
To enjoy a quiet drink when he's not saving the city.

canned_conversations.greeting: (He glances up, gives a slight, almost imperceptible nod, and returns to his drink.)
canned_conversations.start_conversation: Wanna know what's going on in our fine city? Grab a stool. Stay a while.
canned_conversations.ask_what_he_does: Me? I'm just a man enjoying an ale. Nothing more to it.
